welcome.text: Join forces, manage projects, and take productivity to new heights. Achieve all your goals with our Project Management System.
welcome.aboutText: For a team to be productive, it needs powerful tools. Intuitive features of our system allow the team to quickly set up any workflow: from meetings and projects to events and goal setting.
welcome.aboutBoardsText: Make it easy for your team to focus on tasks currently at hand. Define each stage of work to see whatâ€™s important and where things are getting stuck.
welcome.aboutTasksText: In tasks, you can describe detailed information about the current task, add and delete them, which allows you to more flexibly manage the content of tasks.
welcome.courseText: This project was developed as part of the Angular Course provided by The Rolling Scopes developer community.
welcome.courseFreeText: The RS School is working by the principle of "Pay it forward". Members of our community share their knowledge and check students' tasks for free. And we hope that our students will continue this work as our mentors in the future.
welcome.courseOpenText: Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment, or place of residence. However, you should have sufficient base knowledge before the program begins.
welcome.courseCertificateText: After accomplishing all three stages of education, students will receive an electronic certificate of completion.
